title: Single report output schema
description: From todo_pytorch_trt.md: single report output (fps, mAP/Recall, depth/pose, rejection).

title: Deployment hardening: preprocessing + parity + contracts
description:
DESCRIPTION

Reduce deployment accidents along the canonical path (PyTorch → ONNX → TensorRT) by hardening preprocessing, adding parity tests, and enforcing contracts.

SCOPE
- Preprocessing: make adapter preprocessing match real deployment.
- Parity: PyTorch ↔ ONNXRuntime tests (TRT optional local).
- Contracts: validate predictions JSON + meta stability.

ACCEPTANCE
- CI catches common export/parity regressions.
- README/docs remain truthful (no overclaims).

title: infer_cpp: extract template into separate repo and add as git submodule
Improve RTDETRPoseAdapter preprocessing realism
description:
DESCRIPTION

Improve RTDETRPoseAdapter preprocessing to be closer to real deployment preprocessing so PyTorch ↔ ONNX ↔ TRT parity is meaningful.

SCOPE
- Replace PIL getdata-based tensor construction with a standard tensor conversion path.
- Add a clear, documented resize + normalization strategy consistent with intended training.
- Keep dependency surface minimal (torch required at runtime for this adapter; torchvision optional).

ACCEPTANCE
- Unit tests cover shape/range/determinism of preprocessing.
- tools/export_predictions.py --adapter rtdetr_pose still works on coco128.

title: LoRA: expand beyond Linear (Conv/1x1)
description:
DESCRIPTION

Extend the LoRA implementation beyond nn.Linear to cover common conv layers used in vision backbones/heads (at least 1x1 conv), with clear targeting options.

SCOPE
- Add LoRA wrappers/injection utilities for Conv2d (starting with 1x1).
- Add CLI targeting presets (head only, all conv1x1, etc.) and tests.

ACCEPTANCE
- Unit tests verify injection and freeze behavior for Conv2d.
- train_minimal can enable the new targets without breaking existing Linear LoRA.

title: Batch collation for var instances
description: From todo_pytorch_trt.md: collate batch with variable instance counts and masks/depth.

title: Add TTA base interface
description: Create yolozu/tta/base.py with TTARunner API (reset, adapt_step, maybe_log).

title: Adapter hooks for TTT (get_model/build_loader)
description: Add optional adapter hooks used by TTT integration: adapter.get_model() and adapter.build_loader(records,...). Implement stubs/clear errors for adapters without support; add implementation for rtdetr_pose adapter (and dummy adapter for tests).

title: TTT safety: guards, update norms, per-sample reset
description: Add gradient/update norm monitoring + divergence guards to TTT (Tent/MIM), plus per-sample reset option in CLI. Ensure report includes step_metrics and unit tests cover rollback.

title: Runpod GPU: rtdetr_pose TRT inference + parity + benchmark
description: On Runpod (RTX A4500), run rtdetr_pose backend suite end-to-end: PyTorch -> ONNX -> TRT engine, then compare PyTorch/ONNXRT/TRT outputs and benchmark latency/VRAM using the same protocol. Save reports + meta (TRT/CUDA/SM/git SHA).

title: Instance seg eval: per-image diagnostics + worst overlays
description: Add per-image matching summaries (TP/FP/FN, mean IoU) and select overlays by worst samples. Include per-image table in JSON report + HTML, and an option like --overlay-sort {worst,best,first}.

title: Add TTTConfig (yolozu/tta/config.py)
description: Add yolozu/tta/config.py with a TTTConfig dataclass capturing CLI/config defaults (method, steps, lr, batch_size, max_batches, update_filter, mask_prob/patch_size/mask_value, tent entropy settings).

title: README TTA usage
description: Add CLI examples and behavior notes for TTT/Tent in README.

title: TTT usability: presets and diagnostics
description:
DESCRIPTION

Improve practical usability of TTT (Tent/MIM) from tools/export_predictions.py.

SCOPE
- Add recommended presets (e.g., adapter_only + low steps) and document them.
- Improve diagnostics on failure: selected parameter count, method config, and short loss summary.
- Consider adding a small summary in meta.ttt.report (min/mean/max loss) to avoid huge meta payloads.

ACCEPTANCE
- Users can run TTT with fewer footguns and clearer logs.
- Failures are actionable (which params updated, which method, which step).

title: TTT: integrate MIM/Tent into tools/export_predictions.py
description: Implement planned test-time training (TTT) integration so docs match reality and users can enable TTT from export_predictions CLI. Scope: yolozu/tta/integration.py + config, CLI flags, adapter hooks, logging, tests, docs updates.

title: Inference-only utilities
description: From todo_pytorch_trt.md: inference-only utilities (decode + constraints + template verify).

title: Document training/inference/export
description: From todo_pytorch_trt.md: document training/inference/export steps.

title: Add PyTorch vs ONNXRuntime parity tests
description:
DESCRIPTION

Add CPU-friendly parity tests to ensure exported ONNX produces numerically close outputs to PyTorch for deterministic inputs.

SCOPE
- Use a fixed seed and a small deterministic input.
- Compare key outputs (logits, bbox, and pose heads where applicable) within tolerances.
- Target ONNXRuntime as the CI-friendly backend (TensorRT parity can be optional/local).

ACCEPTANCE
- pytest includes parity test(s) runnable on CPU.
- Failures identify which output diverged and by how much.

title: Benchmark fps/latency target
description: From todo_pytorch_trt.md: benchmark fps/latency vs target (>=30 fps).

title: TTA logging + JSON logs
description: Emit loss_mim, steps, updated_param_count, reset_mode per image/batch; optional --log-json.

title: train_minimal: AMP/accum/DDP + stable ONNX artifacts
description:
Goal: make rtdetr_pose/tools/train_minimal.py usable on GPU.

Scope:
- Add AMP (fp16/bf16) switch
- Add gradient accumulation
- Add optional DDP (single-node multi-GPU)
- Always emit reproducible ONNX export artifact (plus meta) per run

Acceptance:
- `python3 rtdetr_pose/tools/train_minimal.py --help` documents flags
- CPU-only tests still pass (torch optional)
- On Runpod RTX A4500: 1-epoch smoke run produces ONNX + meta without error

title: RT-DETR hybrid encoder fusion
description: From todo_pytorch_trt.md: implement RT-DETR hybrid encoder / multiscale fusion if required.

title: Add yolozu/tta/integration.py runner
description: Create yolozu/tta/integration.py implementing run_ttt(adapter, records, config): supports methods {mim,tent}; calls run_ttt_mim or TentRunner; enforces pre-prediction adaptation; returns metrics for logging (updated_param_count, loss summary, mask_ratio).

title: Add unit tests for TTT integration + CLI smoke
description: Add unit tests covering run_ttt integration for MIM and Tent with dummy models/loaders; add CLI smoke test for tools/export_predictions.py with dummy adapter ensuring default path unchanged and TTT path errors clearly when unsupported.

title: RT-DETR training-time tricks
description: From todo_pytorch_trt.md: add RT-DETR training-time tricks (e.g., denoising queries) if needed for parity.

title: Staged cost terms for matching
description: From todo_pytorch_trt.md: staged cost terms in Hungarian matching.

title: Add loss/metric breakdown
description: Log and report training/eval losses and key metrics in a consistent schema so different environments can compare results.

comments.author: akira
comments.text: Added consistent machine-readable loss/metrics reporting: yolozu/metrics_report.py (JSON, JSONL append, single-row CSV, flattening). Wired into rtdetr_pose/tools/train_minimal.py via --metrics-jsonl/--metrics-json/--metrics-csv to emit loss breakdown + avg loss. Added unit test tests/test_metrics_report.py.

title: Template verification (symmetry)
description: From todo_pytorch_trt.md: symmetry-aware template verification (Top-K).

title: YOLO26 competition toolchain (Apache2)
description: Track toolchain needed to beat YOLO26 e2e mAP (COCO detect) per size bucket, without relying on GPL/AGPL code. Use external inference to export JSON, then evaluate in this repo.
notes: Status: dfd.1/dfd.6 done; dfd.2 baseline import completed; xxm wiring done. Remaining: dfd.7 ONNX parity (in progress), dfd.8 TRT pipeline (requires NVIDIA/TensorRT), dfd.9 benchmark blocked on dfd.8.

title: Define YOLO26 eval protocol + target table
description: Lock down evaluation protocol for the YOLO26 competition: dataset split(s), bbox format, e2e mAP definition (no NMS), and reporting schema.

title: CPU: gate weight tuning + modular factories
description: Add CPU-only inference score fusion + offline weight tuner; export uncertainty fields; add rtdetr_pose model/loss factories for easy swapping; improve README Pros/Cons; make license-policy scan tracked files.

title: AI: Tool manifest + schema (CLI API)
description: Provide a machine-readable registry of CLI entrypoints for AI/humans: tools/manifest.json + docs/schemas/tools_manifest.schema.json + validation script + unit test + docs index.

title: AI: Add JSON Schemas for artifacts (predictions/report)
description: Add JSON Schema files for key artifacts (predictions_json, metrics_report_json, coco_eval/eval_suite outputs) and reference them from tools/manifest.json. Keep validation dependency-light.

title: Runpod: TRT pipeline runner + Docker skeleton
description: Provide a repo-local Runpod-friendly way to run the YOLO26 TensorRT pipeline end-to-end (engine build → TRT predictions export → parity vs ONNXRT → eval_suite → latency report artifacts). macOS users should be able to prepare everything except the actual GPU steps.

title: SDFT-inspired self-distillation (continual FT)
description: Add an optional SDFT-inspired self-distillation loss (reverse/forward KL on logits + L1 on regression heads) to reduce catastrophic forgetting when fine-tuning.

title: Reproduce YOLO26 baseline predictions and import
description: Run YOLO26 (or a permitted baseline implementation) externally and export predictions JSON for all size buckets (n/s/m/l/x), then evaluate with eval_suite.
notes:
Ran smoke test on coco128 with dummy predictions via import_yolo26_baseline.py --protocol none --dry-run. Archive: baselines/yolo26_runs/2026-01-31T07-33-28Z (run.json + eval_suite.json).
Generated YOLO26 predictions from Ultralytics pretrained weights on COCO val2017. Predictions: reports/pred_yolo26{n,s,m,l,x}.json. Eval suite: reports/eval_suite.json. Archive: baselines/yolo26_runs/2026-02-02T16-02-34Z (run.json + eval_suite.json). Dataset: data/coco2017_yolo (labels) with images symlinked from data/coco2017/images/val2017. Ultralytics 8.4.9, torch 2.4.1+cu124, device RTX A4500, imgsz=640, conf=0.001, max_det=300, batch=1, end2end=True.
Completed YOLO26 baseline import. Archive: baselines/yolo26_runs/2026-02-02T16-42-38Z (run.json + eval_suite.json). Predictions: reports/pred_yolo26{n,s,m,l,x}.json. eval_suite written to reports/eval_suite.json. COCO val2017 via data/coco2017_yolo. Notes include device=cuda, batch=8, imgsz=640, conf=0.001, iou=0.7, max_det=300, end2end=True, half=True; hardware RTX A4500.

comments.author: akira
comments.text: Added pinned baseline import+archive flow: tools/import_yolo26_baseline.py (validates pred_yolo26*.json, runs tools/eval_suite.py --protocol yolo26, archives to baselines/yolo26_runs/<run-id>/ with run.json + eval_suite.json). Docs: docs/yolo26_baseline_repro.md and baselines/yolo26_runs/README.md. Next: run external YOLO26 (or permitted impl) on COCO val2017 to generate real pred_yolo26{n,s,m,l,x}.json and re-run the importer (omit --dry-run).

comments.author: akira
comments.text: Started: hardened tools/import_yolo26_baseline.py to require exactly one file for each bucket yolo26n/s/m/l/x (fails loudly if missing/duplicate) and records bucket_files mapping in run.json. Next step still needs the real external YOLO26 prediction JSONs to be placed somewhere matching the glob (recommended: reports/pred_yolo26{n,s,m,l,x}.json), then run the importer to archive eval_suite.json + metadata.

comments.author: akira
comments.text: Smoke pipeline OK (non-protocol): generated dummy yolo26{n,s,m,l,x} JSONs via tools/make_dummy_predictions.py on coco128 and ran tools/import_yolo26_baseline.py --dataset data/coco128 --protocol none --split train2017 --dry-run. Output eval_suite.json at reports/eval_suite.json and archive at /tmp/yolo26_runs_smoke/smoke-coco128. Real completion still requires full COCO val2017 + real YOLO26 predictions JSONs.

title: Training recipe v1 (augment/multiscale/schedule)
description: Establish a strong baseline training recipe for COCO detect: augmentation (mosaic/mixup/copy-paste/etc), multi-scale, optimizer/schedule, EMA, and deterministic seeding.
notes:
Baseline pipeline now can run adapter outputs (tools/run_baseline.py) for quick sanity, but acceptance still requires external training run + improved predictions JSON.
Expanded training_recipe_v1 with determinism flags, aug schedule, and optimizer implementation notes. Still pending external training run + improved predictions JSON.
Tried external run in repo: downloaded coco128 subset (manual due to SSL mismatch), ran rtdetr_pose train_minimal (2 epochs, batch=2) and exported predictions. COCO eval mAP50-95=0.0; no improvement. Need real trained model/predictions JSON from external training to meet acceptance.
GPU coco128 run complete. Trained minimal RTDETRPose w/ matcher: reports/rtdetr_pose_ckpt_coco128_gpu_matcher.pt. Predictions: reports/pred_coco128_rtdetr_pose_gpu_matcher.json. Eval: reports/coco_eval_rtdetr_pose_gpu_matcher.json (mAP50-95=0.000622) vs baseline reports/coco_eval_rtdetr_pose.json (mAP50-95=1.829e-06). Training+export cmds recorded in docs/training_recipe_v1.md. Also updated train_minimal to accept --device and to apply config num_queries/num_classes before dataset build.

title: train_minimal: collate variable #instances
description: Implement a robust collate/target padding strategy for variable instance counts in train_minimal. Ensure padded targets keep per-instance counts and masks suitable for Hungarian alignment or legacy path.
notes:
Implemented variable-instance collation in train_minimal: handle empty GT in matcher path, add padded batch targets with gt_count/gt_mask, and route per-sample targets to Hungarian alignment. Added rtdetr_pose/tests/test_train_minimal_collate.py. Full pytest: 91 passed, 1 skipped.
Added multiscale + hflip augmentation options to train_minimal (new CLI flags: --multiscale/--scale-min/--scale-max/--hflip-prob). Resizes images, updates image_hw, flips bbox cx, scales/flip-adjusts offsets, and adjusts intrinsics for scale/flip. Added rtdetr_pose/tests/test_train_minimal_augment.py. Full pytest: 92 passed, 1 skipped.
Note: augmentation/multiscale work is tracked under YOLOZU-dfd.3.2; prior note appended here was superseded.

title: train_minimal: hflip schedule
description: Add a simple linear schedule for horizontal flip probability over epochs.
notes:
Added linear hflip schedule support (new flags: --hflip-prob-start/--hflip-prob-end). compute_linear_schedule helper and per-epoch update of ds.hflip_prob. Added rtdetr_pose/tests/test_train_minimal_hflip_schedule.py. Full pytest: 99 passed, 1 skipped.
Added linear hflip schedule support (new flags: --hflip-prob-start/--hflip-prob-end). compute_linear_schedule helper and per-epoch update of ds.hflip_prob. Added rtdetr_pose/tests/test_train_minimal_hflip_schedule.py. Full pytest: 99 passed, 1 skipped.

title: train_minimal: augmentation/multiscale
description: Add basic augmentation controls (multiscale resize + horizontal flip) to train_minimal and keep targets/intrinsics consistent. Add tests and keep pytest green.
notes: Implemented multiscale + hflip augmentation in train_minimal (new CLI flags: --multiscale/--scale-min/--scale-max/--hflip-prob). Resizes images, updates image_hw, flips bbox cx, scales/flip-adjusts offsets, and adjusts intrinsics for scale/flip. Added rtdetr_pose/tests/test_train_minimal_augment.py. Full pytest: 92 passed, 1 skipped.

title: train_minimal: intrinsics jitter
description: Add intrinsics jitter augmentation to train_minimal using configurable jitter ranges, keeping K_gt consistent and deterministic per sample.
notes: Added intrinsics jitter augmentation in train_minimal (new CLI flags: --intrinsics-jitter, --jitter-dfx/dfy/dcx/dcy). Jitter applied after scale/flip; K_gt updated deterministically per sample. Added rtdetr_pose/tests/test_train_minimal_intrinsics_jitter.py and updated augment test for new signature. Full pytest: 93 passed, 1 skipped.

title: train_minimal: SIM jitter profile
description: Wire SIM jitter profile support into train_minimal so K_gt intrinsics jitter uses yolozu.jitter profiles (default or JSON override) deterministically per sample.
notes:
Added SIM jitter profile support in train_minimal (new flags: --sim-jitter, --sim-jitter-profile). Uses yolozu.jitter.sample_intrinsics_jitter to adjust K_gt deterministically per sample; SIM jitter takes precedence over manual intrinsics jitter. Updated augment/intrinsics tests for new signature and added rtdetr_pose/tests/test_train_minimal_sim_jitter.py. Full pytest: 94 passed, 1 skipped.
Follow-up: added mask/depth array loading + padded collation in train_minimal matcher targets (gt_M/gt_D_obj tensors when load_aux provides arrays). Collate now pads gt_M/gt_D_obj. Added rtdetr_pose/tests/test_train_minimal_mask_depth_collate.py. Full pytest: 95 passed, 1 skipped.
Note: mask/depth collation work is tracked under YOLOZU-dfd.3.5; prior note here was superseded.

title: train_minimal: mask/depth collation
description: Load per-instance mask/depth arrays (when load_aux is enabled) and pad/stack them in the batch collation for matcher training.
notes: Implemented mask/depth array loading + padded collation in train_minimal matcher targets (gt_M/gt_D_obj tensors when load_aux provides arrays). Collate pads gt_M/gt_D_obj. Added rtdetr_pose/tests/test_train_minimal_mask_depth_collate.py. Full pytest: 95 passed, 1 skipped.

title: train_minimal: extrinsics jitter
description: Add extrinsics jitter augmentation (translation + roll/pitch/yaw) to train_minimal, including SIM profile support and deterministic per-sample behavior.
notes: Added extrinsics jitter support in train_minimal (SIM profile + manual). New flags: --sim-jitter-extrinsics, --extrinsics-jitter, --jitter-dx/dy/dz/droll/dpitch/dyaw. Applies translation and roll/pitch/yaw rotations to gt_t/gt_R deterministically per sample. Added rtdetr_pose/tests/test_train_minimal_extrinsics_jitter.py and updated tests for new signature. Full pytest: 96 passed, 1 skipped.

title: train_minimal: lr warmup schedule
description: Add a simple learning-rate warmup schedule to train_minimal (linear warmup to base lr).
notes: Added LR warmup support to train_minimal (new flags: --lr-warmup-steps, --lr-warmup-init). Implemented compute_warmup_lr helper and per-step LR updates. Added rtdetr_pose/tests/test_train_minimal_lr_warmup.py. Full pytest: 97 passed, 1 skipped.

title: train_minimal: grad clipping
description: Add optional gradient clipping to train_minimal training loop.
notes: Added optional gradient clipping in train_minimal (--clip-grad-norm). Applied clip before optimizer step. Added rtdetr_pose/tests/test_train_minimal_grad_clip.py. Full pytest: 98 passed, 1 skipped.

title: train_minimal: config-aligned export/eval
description: Align train_minimal with base config for export/eval and make eval/adapter robust for external runs.
notes: Changes: train_minimal can load base config model settings (num_queries/hidden_dim/etc) for shape alignment; adapter filters mismatched state_dict keys/shapes; COCO eval returns zeros for empty detections to avoid pycocotools errors. External run: trained with base config and exported predictions to reports/predictions_train_minimal_base.json; eval report at reports/eval_train_minimal_base.json (map50_95≈5.06e-06 on coco128/train2017). Full pytest: 98 passed, 1 skipped.

title: Knowledge distillation (teacher→student)
description: Add distillation (logits/feature distill) from a larger teacher to improve smaller size buckets without changing eval protocol.
notes: Added lightweight distillation helper: tools/distill_predictions.py + yolozu/distillation.py + yolozu/simple_map.py. Config supports enable/disable and parameters; report includes distill loss term and before/after map50/map50_95 on fixed subset when dataset provided. Docs: docs/distillation.md. Tests: tests/test_distillation.py.

title: Hyperparameter sweep harness
description: Automate HPO (LR, wd, aug strength, resolution, matching/loss weights) and collect results into a comparable report.
notes: Added sweep harness (tools/hpo_sweep.py), mock trainer (tools/mock_train.py), and example config (docs/hpo_sweep_example.json). Smoke run: python3 tools/hpo_sweep.py --config docs/hpo_sweep_example.json --resume --max-runs 1 (outputs to reports/ + runs/hpo/*).

title: E2E mAP score calibration (no NMS)
description: Improve e2e mAP without NMS by calibrating classification/objectness scores (e.g., temperature scaling, focal tweaks) and selecting consistent score thresholds for reporting.
notes: Added score calibration helper: tools/calibrate_scores.py + yolozu/calibration.py + yolozu/simple_map.py; produces report/artifact with before/after map50/map50_95 on fixed subset and temperature grid. Docs: docs/score_calibration.md. Tests: tests/test_simple_map.py.

title: ONNX export parity + validation
description: Export the chosen model to ONNX and validate numerical parity of predictions JSON vs PyTorch reference (within tolerance).
notes: Started: added --image-size option to tools/check_predictions_parity.py to avoid needing image files; documented in docs/onnx_export_parity.md.

comments.author: akira
comments.text: Added generic parity checker tools/check_predictions_parity.py (matches detections by class+IoU, checks bbox/score tolerances) and documentation docs/onnx_export_parity.md. This unblocks ONNX-vs-PyTorch numerical parity validation once a concrete model/export path exists.

title: Investigate ONNX raw NMS parity mismatch
description: Analyze remaining mismatches between PyTorch raw+NMS predictions and ONNXRuntime raw+NMS outputs; align postprocess or decoding to reach parity.
notes: Findings: raw ONNX outputs match PyTorch closely (max diff ~2.4e-3, p99 ~6e-5) with identical preprocessing. Added --raw-postprocess ultralytics and scale_boxes alignment, but parity still fails with many missing_match/value_mismatch at IoU 0.99/0.98. Root cause appears to be NMS sensitivity to tiny logit differences; large mismatch persists even with CPU reference. Documented this note in docs/onnx_export_parity.md.

title: TensorRT FP16/INT8 pipeline
description: Build TRT engine(s) (FP16, optional INT8) from ONNX, with calibration data and reproducible build scripts.

comments.author: akira
comments.text: Added Runpod-friendly orchestration: deploy/runpod/README.md + tools/run_trt_pipeline.py (+ wrapper deploy/runpod/run_trt_pipeline.sh). On Linux+NVIDIA, this can build engines, export TRT/ONNXRT predictions, run parity, and emit eval_suite + latency reports in one command.

title: Latency/FPS benchmark harness (target HW)
description: Measure throughput/latency on target hardware for each size bucket and store results in the same report schema.
notes: Implemented benchmark_latency harness + measure_latency helpers; blocked on YOLOZU-dfd.8 to close.

comments.author: akira
comments.text: Runner now exists to generate real per-engine metrics JSONs (tools/measure_trt_latency.py) and aggregate them (tools/benchmark_latency.py). When dfd.8 engines exist on target HW, run deploy/runpod/run_trt_pipeline.sh to emit reports/benchmark_latency.json (+ JSONL history if configured).

title: Constraints gating (depth/plane/upright)
description: From todo_pytorch_trt.md: constraints gating (depth prior/plane/upright).

title: train_minimal: config + resume checkpoint
description:
Add config-driven runs and resume/checkpoint support to rtdetr_pose/tools/train_minimal.py.

Motivation: training_recipe_v1 calls for reproducible runs; current script only supports inline CLI flags and can only write model state_dict.

Scope:
- Add --config (yaml/json) to set defaults.
- Add --resume-from to load weights or full training bundle.
- Add --checkpoint-bundle-out to save model+optimizer+progress metadata.
- Keep existing flags behavior stable.

Add a small unit test (skipped if torch missing) and keep full pytest passing.
notes:
Implemented config-driven defaults + checkpoint/resume for rtdetr_pose/tools/train_minimal.py.
- New: --config (YAML/JSON) applies top-level keys as argparse defaults (CLI flags override)
- New: --resume-from loads either weights-only state_dict or a full bundle (model_state_dict/optim_state_dict/epoch/global_step)
- New: --checkpoint-bundle-out writes full bundle; --checkpoint-every optionally writes step-stamped bundles
- Back-compat: --checkpoint-out still writes weights-only state_dict
Added unit test rtdetr_pose/tests/test_train_minimal_config_checkpoint.py. Full pytest passes.

title: Dataset quality gates: stricter policy and checks
description:
DESCRIPTION

Strengthen dataset validation and gating to catch common labeling/data issues early, with configurable warn vs fail policy.

SCOPE
- Add checks for bbox range, empty images, class-id mismatches, missing files, and inconsistent metadata.
- Provide a policy mode (warn vs fail) for CI and for local iteration.

ACCEPTANCE
- Validator produces clear actionable errors.
- CI can enforce a strict mode on sample datasets.

title: TTA tests
description: Add tests: tta off keeps schema, mask determinism with seed, norm_only updates only norm.

title: Staged training offsets then K
description: From todo_pytorch_trt.md: staged training (offsets first, then GlobalKHead).

title: Record run metadata (git/versions)
description:
Add a small utility to capture reproducibility metadata (git sha, dirty flag, python/pkg versions, argv, dataset root) and include it in training outputs.

Scope:
- New helper module yolozu/run_record.py.
- Wire into rtdetr_pose/tools/train_minimal.py: include run_record in final metrics JSON/CSV and in checkpoint bundles.
- Add unit tests that do not require torch.

Keep full pytest passing.
notes: Implemented run record metadata: added yolozu/run_record.py (git sha+dirty, python/platform + optional numpy/torch/Pillow/PyYAML versions, argv/args/dataset_root). Wired into rtdetr_pose/tools/train_minimal.py (included in final metrics report meta and passed into checkpoint bundles). Cast module __version__ to plain str to keep torch checkpoint bundles loadable under torch.load(weights_only=True). Added tests/test_run_record.py; full pytest: 90 passed, 1 skipped.

title: RT-DETR backbone+neck parity
description: From todo_pytorch_trt.md: implement full RT-DETR backbone+neck parity with spec.

title: Seg dataset: add Cityscapes loader + prepare tool
description: Add support for Cityscapes semantic segmentation training data: loader that discovers image/mask pairs (labelTrainIds/labelIds), and a tool to emit a YOLOZU-friendly dataset layout + dataset.json manifest.

title: export_predictions: LoRA option + Hessian CLI smoke tests
Enable real-image loading in train_minimal
description: Current rtdetr_pose/tools/train_minimal.py uses random images (scaffold) so it cannot demonstrate learning or produce meaningful mAP. Add an optional mode to load/resize real JPEGs from dataset manifest (record['image_path']) using a lightweight optional dependency (Pillow), keeping the default behavior unchanged.
notes: Implemented optional real-image mode for rtdetr_pose/tools/train_minimal.py via --real-images (loads record['image_path'] JPEGs, resizes to --image-size). Default remains synthetic/random images to keep deps minimal. Added Pillow to requirements-test.txt so the flag works in dev/test env. Documented example command in docs/training_recipe_v1.md. Full pytest passes.

title: MIM teacher + masking schedule
description: From todo_pytorch_trt.md: MIM teacher + masking + loss schedule.

title: export_predictions.py: add --ttt flags + meta logging
description: Extend tools/export_predictions.py with CLI flags: --ttt, --ttt-method {mim,tent}, --ttt-steps, --ttt-lr, --ttt-batch-size, --ttt-max-batches, --ttt-update-filter, MIM-specific mask args, Tent-specific args, --ttt-log-out. When enabled, run TTT before adapter.predict; include a ttt block under meta when --wrap; write optional log JSON.

title: P0/P1: unified CLI + doctor + predict-images + HTML report
Inference path + constraints gating
description: From todo_pytorch_trt.md: inference path with translation recovery, template verify, constraints gate.

title: Validate meta contract in wrapped predictions
description:
DESCRIPTION

Extend validation to cover wrapped outputs with a stable meta contract.

DETAILS
- Define and enforce a schema/validator for the meta fields written by tools/export_predictions.py when --wrap is used.
- Validate required keys and types for common configurations:
  - adapter=dummy
  - TTA enabled/disabled
  - TTT enabled/disabled
- Add tests that fail with clear messages on malformed meta.

ACCEPTANCE
- validate_predictions rejects malformed wrapped meta with actionable errors.
- Tests cover wrapped meta validation.

title: Instance segmentation: PNG contract + evaluator
description:
Add instance segmentation support focused on evaluation / contracts using PNG masks.

Scope:
- Define predictions JSON contract for instance seg (per-image instances with class_id/score/mask.png).
- Add evaluator tool (AP@IoU thresholds, per-class + summary) with optional HTML report.
- Support ground-truth instance masks via YOLO sidecar metadata (mask_path list + mask_classes, or instance-id mask).
- Add unit tests + manifest entry.

Out of scope:
- Training a mask model in-repo (rtdetr_pose does not output masks yet).

title: Low-FP gate by score_tmp_sym
description: From todo_pytorch_trt.md: low-FP gate via score_tmp_sym threshold.

title: SIM jitter + data augmentation
description: From todo_pytorch_trt.md: data augmentation + SIM jitter integration.

title: Scenario suite run
description: From todo_pytorch_trt.md: scenario suite run (symmetry/tabletop/jitter/etc).

title: Param update filtering
description: Implement norm_only/adapter_only/all update filtering and updated_param_count logging.

title: Integrate TTA into export_predictions
description: Add CLI flags and hook TTA steps before inference; keep predictions.json format identical when --tta off.

title: infer_cpp: add Docker build recipes for ONNXRuntime/TensorRT
Implement Tent runner
description: Create yolozu/tta/tent.py: entropy minimization + norm-only updates (optional with TTT).

title: TensorRT export/parity/bench (PyTorch)
description: From todo_pytorch_trt.md: PyTorch->TRT export/parity/bench workflow for model.

title: Implement TTT MIM runner
description: Create yolozu/tta/ttt_mim.py: mask generation, reconstruction loss, update loop with param filtering.

title: Continual learning v2: pose metrics + stronger baselines
description:
Follow-ups after initial CL runner:

- Add pose/depth evaluation (IoU match GT↔pred, geodesic rot error, depth/translation errors) and include in continual matrix + HTML.
- Add stronger CL baselines: DER++-style replay (store logits/features in buffer), optional EWC/SI regularizers.
- Improve replay: ratio-based sampling (replay_fraction), per-task caps, and support png images in dataset scan.
- Integrate into unified CLI (tools/yolozu.py) as continual-train / continual-eval.

title: TTT safety: add preset defaults + docs/examples
description: Decide safe default guard thresholds/presets (max_grad_norm/max_update_norm/max_total_update_norm, loss guards) for Tent/MIM; document recommended usage + reset policy (stream vs sample) and add example commands to README/docs.

title: Collate pads/query-align labels/bboxes
description: From todo_pytorch_trt.md: collate pads + query-align labels/bboxes for matcher.

title: Design TTT integration plan
description: Design files/modules for TTT (MIM primary, Tent optional) and how to integrate into tools/export_predictions.py without breaking existing flow.

title: Add CUDA smoke tests for RTDETRPose export
TRT parity tests vs PyTorch
description: From todo_pytorch_trt.md: parity tests PyTorch vs TensorRT outputs.

title: COCO instance seg import: polygons/RLE -> PNG contract
description: Add optional tool to convert COCO instance segmentation annotations/predictions (polygons/RLE via pycocotools) into YOLOZU's per-instance PNG mask contract + sidecar metadata (mask_path list + mask_classes).

title: Integrate mask into losses
description: Implement training loss terms that consume instance masks (PNG/npy/json) and wire through matcher outputs; include config/flags and tests.

title: CI smoke run for scenarios
description: From todo_pytorch_trt.md: CI smoke run on tiny COCO subset.

title: Leaderboard report for eval_suite.json
description: Add a leaderboard generator that summarizes reports/eval_suite.json to markdown/tsv and optionally compares to yolo26 target mAP.

title: Baseline report: unify COCO eval + scenarios + fps
description:
DESCRIPTION

Make baseline reporting more reproducible and useful by producing a single consolidated report that includes: fps, scenario-suite metrics, and (optionally) COCO mAP.

SCOPE
- Extend tools/run_baseline.py (or add a new tool) to optionally run eval_coco and scenario suite.
- Record run metadata (argv, git SHA, timestamps, dataset split, prediction hash/path).

ACCEPTANCE
- One JSON output contains both speed and quality metrics with provenance.
- Works with precomputed adapter as well as rtdetr_pose.

title: Task aligner
description: Implement/define a task aligner (multi-task weighting / label-space alignment) to make metrics comparable across tasks.

comments.author: akira
comments.text: Implemented minimal multi-task loss aligner: rtdetr_pose/rtdetr_pose/task_aligner.py (uncertainty-weighted alignment) + wiring into rtdetr_pose/rtdetr_pose/losses.py via Losses(task_aligner=...). train_minimal now supports --use-uncertainty + --task-aligner uncertainty. Docs: docs/task_aligner.md. Deterministic test: tests/test_task_aligner.py.

title: Normalize predictions (category_id↔class_id)
description: Implement a tool to normalize predictions JSON class ids using labels/<split>/classes.json (category_id -> class_id, or treating class_id as category_id).

title: Wire real training/inference repo for real metrics
description:
From todo_symmetry_commonsense_realtime.md: current gates/metrics are validated against scaffolded baseline (reports/baseline.json), not a real model.

Acceptance criteria:
- Add/point adapter to an actual training+inference implementation (RT-DETR / pose pipeline)
- Run scenario suite end-to-end on real outputs
- Produce updated baseline report (metrics + fps) with same schema
- Ensure existing gates (constraints, symmetry-aware metrics) still pass or adjust thresholds with rationale

Notes:
- Keep realtime gating logic out of TRT graph where possible
- Preserve existing report schema + CI scenario runner
notes: Wired real inference path using in-repo rtdetr_pose; adapter runs on coco128 CPU; scenario runner + baseline.json generated; gates check passes (scaffolded metrics). Remaining improvements depend on higher-quality trained weights.

title: Select real model repo + interface
description:
Decide the concrete training/inference implementation to wire (e.g., rtdetr_pose package vs external repo) and define the minimal adapter interface needed by scenario runner.

Acceptance:
- Document target entrypoints (train/infer/export)
- Identify inputs/outputs needed by yolozu runner/metrics
- Confirm how to obtain predictions deterministically for tests
notes: Documented in-repo rtdetr_pose as current real-model choice + entrypoints/IO/determinism in docs/real_model_interface.md.

title: Implement adapter to real inference
description:
Implement adapter that calls the chosen inference pipeline and returns outputs in the schema expected by yolozu pipeline/metrics.

Acceptance:
- Adapter runs on coco128 smoke subset
- Produces required keys for report generation
notes:
RTDETR pose adapter runs on coco128 smoke subset via local venv (torch CPU):
- ./.venv/bin/python tools/export_predictions.py --adapter rtdetr_pose --dataset data/coco128 --max-images 5 --image-size 160 --score-threshold 0.01 --max-detections 10 --wrap --output reports/predictions_rtdetr_pose.json
- python3 tools/validate_predictions.py reports/predictions_rtdetr_pose.json --strict (OK)
Adapter import fixed by adding repo_root/rtdetr_pose to sys.path in yolozu/adapter.py.

title: Run scenarios on real outputs
description:
Wire scenario runner to use the real adapter end-to-end.

Acceptance:
- tools/run_scenarios.py (or equivalent) completes
- Report schema unchanged
notes:
Scenario runner completed with RTDETR pose adapter on coco128 smoke subset:
- ./.venv/bin/python tools/run_scenarios.py --adapter rtdetr_pose --dataset data/coco128 --max-images 5 --image-size 160 --score-threshold 0.01 --max-detections 10
Output: reports/scenario_run.json (schema unchanged).

title: Generate new baseline.json from real model
description:
Run baseline pipeline using real model outputs and write updated reports/baseline.json.

Acceptance:
- Baseline reproducible (document command)
- Includes metrics + fps
notes: Re-ran baseline on full coco128 (no max-images) after installing numpy: ./.venv/bin/python tools/run_baseline.py --adapter rtdetr_pose --dataset data/coco128 --image-size 160 --score-threshold 0.01 --max-detections 10 --output reports/baseline.json --predictions-out reports/predictions_rtdetr_pose_baseline.json --wrap (fps≈10.24 on CPU; recall/map proxies 0.0 for this tiny scaffold)

title: Re-tune gates/thresholds (if needed)
description:
If real outputs violate existing gates, adjust thresholds with rationale and update docs/tests accordingly.

Acceptance:
- Gates pass in CI
- Changes justified in notes
notes: Gates were already passing; CI breakage was due to pytest collecting tests as 'tests.*' and failing module resolution. Added pytest.ini to force --import-mode=importlib so collection is stable (avoids name collision with third-party 'tests' package).

title: Spec/checklist update refs
description: From todo_pytorch_trt.md: update spec/checklist with implementation refs.

title: ONNX->TRT engine build (model)
description: From todo_pytorch_trt.md: ONNX->TRT engine build for model.

title: Apache2 inference exporter skeleton (ONNXRuntime/TRT)
description: Provide Apache-2.0-friendly inference exporter skeletons for ONNX Runtime and TensorRT to produce YOLOZU predictions JSON (NMS-free), with fixed preprocessing (imgsz=640) and config capture.

comments.author: akira
comments.text: Implemented Apache-2.0-friendly inference exporter skeletons: tools/export_predictions_onnxrt.py (generic ORT runner with letterbox@640, no NMS, maps input-space xyxy boxes back to original and outputs cxcywh_norm) and tools/export_predictions_trt.py (dry-run + runtime skeleton placeholder). Added helper yolozu/letterbox.py, docs update in docs/yolo26_baseline_repro.md, and tests/test_exporter_skeletons.py (dry-run mode).

title: Training pipeline (aug/matcher/MIM/staged)
description: From todo_pytorch_trt.md: complete training pipeline (augment, matcher, MIM teacher, staged schedule).
